name: dev.yarnspinner.unity
description: Yarn Spinner is the friendly tool for interactive conversations. Write your dialogue in a simple programming language that's designed to be straightforward for writers and powerful for programmers, and then attach it to your scenes to power your conversations.

samples.description: ▪ Intro: a welcome to Yarn Spinner scene ▪ FeatureTour: basic functionality of Yarn Spinner ▪ BackgroundChatter: simultaneous conversations ▪ Replacement Markup: styling or modifying line text ▪ Inline Events: triggering events during line delivery ▪ Samples demonstrating localization + audio integrations ▪ Samples demonstrating dynamic/storylet content ▪ Samples demonstrating custom UI or dialogue behaviours
